 'Albert II', (born 6 June 1934) is the King
of the Belgians, a constitutional monarch. He is a member of the royal house "of
Belgium"; formerly this house was named Saxe-Coburg-Gotha. He is the uncle of
the current reigning Grand Duke of Luxembourg, Henri.
